activities.name: Robotics Club
activities.description: Designed autonomous navigation systems for competitive robots
activities.impact: Led team to state championship, mentored 15 younger students

activities.name: Volunteer Tutoring
activities.description: Tutored underprivileged students in algebra and geometry
activities.impact: Improved student grades by average of 1.2 letter grades

activities.name: Cultural Heritage Club
activities.description: Organized cultural awareness events and language preservation workshops
activities.impact: Increased school cultural diversity awareness by 40%, preserved family traditions

activities.name: Creative Writing Club
activities.description: Edited school literary magazine and mentored aspiring writers
activities.impact: Published 50+ student works, increased magazine readership by 60%

activities.name: Environmental Club
activities.description: Led campus sustainability initiatives and community clean-up events
activities.impact: Reduced school waste by 25%, organized 12 community events

core_values.description: Belief in using technology to solve real-world problems
evidence: Created app for local food bank

core_values.description: Deep appreciation for heritage and traditions
Responsibility to protect and preserve our planet
Belief in the power of words and storytelling

defining_moments.title: First Programming Success
defining_moments.description: Creating my first working program that solved a real problem
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Overwhelming sense of accomplishment and purpose
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Technology can be a powerful tool for positive change

defining_moments.title: Helping Struggling Student
defining_moments.description: Tutoring a student who was failing math and seeing them succeed
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep satisfaction from making a difference
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Everyone learns differently; patience and adaptation are key

defining_moments.title: Reconnecting with Heritage
defining_moments.description: Learning about my family's immigration story and organizing cultural events
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep pride in my identity and desire to preserve traditions
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Understanding your roots strengthens your sense of self

defining_moments.title: Environmental Wake-Up Call
defining_moments.description: Witnessing environmental damage in local park and taking action
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Urgent need to protect the planet for future generations
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Individual actions can create meaningful community change

defining_moments.title: Publishing First Story
defining_moments.description: Seeing my creative writing published in the school magazine
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Validation of my voice and creative abilities
